column1: #Text=Korra says : " No , I have this awful pit in my stomach . "
#Text=And now , I ca n't imagine my life without you in it .
#Text=You 're the most loyal , brave , and selfless person I 've ever known .
#Text=" Korra says : " I think you 're pretty incredible too , but ... you already knew that .
#Text=" Korra says : " I should probably try to get some sleep .
#Text=" Amon says : " You will now be cleansed of your impurity .
#Text=" Korra says : " Once the United Forces arrive , we need to be ready to help in any way we can .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Hmm ... Amon had to know we were coming .
#Text=So why are n't we meeting any resistance ?
